mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT permission FROM sys_menu WHERE permission IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT m.permission FROM sys_menu m JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.permission IS NOT NULL

SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.is_visible = 1 AND m.is_enabled = 1 AND type != 3 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.sort_order
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE FIND_IN_SET(#{menuId}, ancestors) > 0
